price: Bazazungura Firidawusi (Ijuru risumba ayandi), bakazaribamo ubuziraherezo.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
